function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of GIS data for COVID-19 mapping","Impact":"Inaccurate mapping can lead to misallocation of resources and ineffective mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Regular updates and validation of GIS data to ensure accuracy","Technologies":"GIS mapping tools, spatial analytics","People":"Epidemiologists, governments, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health departments, GIS experts"},{"Description":"Bluetooth contact tracing for COVID-19","Impact":"Privacy concerns, false positives, and reliance on user participation","Mitigation":"Transparent data handling, user consent, and accuracy verification","Technologies":"Bluetooth technology, contact tracing applications","People":"General public, health authorities","Owner":"Health departments, app developers"}]}
